definitions.definition: Of or relating to polity , or civil government; political.
Relating to, or promoting, a policy , especially a national policy; well-devised; adapted to its end, whether right or wrong.
Sagacious in promoting a policy; ingenious in devising and advancing a system of management; devoted to a scheme or system rather than to a principle; hence, in a good sense, wise; prudent; sagacious
Shrewd , prudent and expedient ; showing policy.

main_definition: ( archaic ) Of or relating to polity , or civil government; political.
secondary_definitions: ( archaic , of things ) Relating to, or promoting, a policy , especially a national policy; well-devised; adapted to its end, whether right or wrong.

( archaic ) Sagacious in promoting a policy; ingenious in devising and advancing a system of management; devoted to a scheme or system rather than to a principle; hence, in a good sense, wise; prudent; sagacious
Shrewd , prudent and expedient ; showing policy.
